result:
div
  h1 休假申請
  div
    v-container(fluid='')
      v-row(justify='center' no-gutters='')
        v-col(cols='12' md='2')
          p 休假類型：
        v-col(cols='12' md='2')
          v-select(:items='leaveTypes' label='' dark='' v-model='leaveType')
      v-row(justify='center' no-gutters='')
        v-col(cols='12' md='2')
          p 日期：
        v-col(cols='12' md='2')
          v-dialog(ref='dialog3' v-model='datePicker.modal' :return-value.sync='datePicker.date' persistent='' lazy='' full-width='' width='290px')
            template(v-slot:activator='{ on }')
              v-text-field(dark='' v-model='datePicker.date' label='請選擇日期' prepend-icon='event' readonly='' color='white' v-on='on' single-line='')
            v-date-picker(v-model='datePicker.date' scrollable='' locale='zh-cn' color='#A78E70')
              v-spacer
              v-btn(flat='' color='primary' @click='datePicker.modal = false') Cancel
              v-btn(flat='' color='primary' @click='$refs.dialog3.save(datePicker.date)') OK
      v-row(justify='center' no-gutters='')
        v-col(cols='12' md='2')
          p 時間：
        v-col(cols='12' md='1')
          v-dialog(ref='dialog' v-model=' timePicker.modal' :return-value.sync='timePicker.timeFrom' persistent='' lazy='' full-width='' width='290px')
            template(v-slot:activator='{ on }')
              v-text-field(dark='' v-model='timePicker.timeFrom' label='起始時間' prepend-icon='access_time' readonly='' v-on='on' color='#FFF')
            v-time-picker(v-if='timePicker.modal' v-model='timePicker.timeFrom' full-width='' format='24hr' color='#A78E70')
              v-spacer
              v-btn(flat='' color='primary' @click='timePicker.modal = false') Cancel
              v-btn(flat='' color='primary' @click='$refs.dialog.save(timePicker.timeFrom),timeCaculate()') OK
        v-col(cols='12' md='1')
          v-dialog(ref='dialog2' v-model=' timePicker.modal2' :return-value.sync='timePicker.timeTo' persistent='' lazy='' full-width='' width='290px')
            template(v-slot:activator='{ on }')
              v-text-field(dark='' v-model='timePicker.timeTo' label='結束時間' prepend-icon='access_time' readonly='' v-on='on' color='#FFF')
            v-time-picker(v-if='timePicker.modal2' v-model='timePicker.timeTo' full-width='' format='24hr' color='#A78E70')
              v-spacer
              v-btn(flat='' color='primary' @click='timePicker.modal2 = false') Cancel
              v-btn(flat='' color='primary' @click='$refs.dialog2.save(timePicker.timeTo),timeCaculate()') OK
      v-row(justify='center' no-gutters='')
        v-col(cols='12' md='2')
          p 共計：
        v-col(cols='12' md='2')
          p {{total.value}} 小時
      v-row(justify='center' no-gutters='')
        v-col(cols='12' md='2')
          p 職務代理人：
        v-col(cols='12' md='2')
          v-select(:items='agents' label='' dark='' v-model='agent')
  .circleButton(:style="{'background-color':color.but}" @click='paseValue()')
    router-link(to='/leave/Submmit' :style="{color: '#FFF'}") 申請
